description:
**Fix Overview**:

To enhance auto-upgrade detection and prevent unnecessary retries:

1. Ensure that the system meets the necessary OS or .NET runtime requirements before triggering the upgrade process.
2. Update to version 2.3.6.0, which improves auto-upgrade functionality and addresses earlier bugs related to upgrade detection.

**Details**:
- This update will prevent the automatic upgrade process from retrying on machines that do not meet the required specifications, streamlining the upgrade experience for users.
- For further information on this version, refer to the official documentation at [Microsoft Version History](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/hybrid/connect/reference-connect-version-history#2360).
